page.title: 05Changing times
page.content: Changing Times (1905-1985) The population in 1905 was 1541 compared to the population in 1810 which was around the 2000 mark. The population now is 1590. As you will see the population has not differed much between 1905 - 1985. Six housing estates have been developed Bowring Mead and Bidder Close in the south of the town,Embleford Cresant,Fordlands and Queens Road in the north of the town and Mount Pleasant in the centre. There used to be two schools in Moretonhampstead one for boys and one for girls.The boys school is no longer used but the girls school has been made into a Primary School for boys and girls.In this time the pubs have decreased from thirteen in number too five now.
